ListPreference.android:title: User agent
ListPreference.android:summary: Choose whether to save the desktop or mobile version of webpage

SwitchPreference.android:title: Night mode
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Use a dark theme, and also use inverted rendering in the viewer (Black becomes white and vice versa)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save in background
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Keep this enabled unless you experience problems

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Advanced options for saving
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose how errors should be handled and what parts of a webpage to save (images, scripts...). Use with care

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save images in webpage
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable if you do not want images in webpages to be saved. Saving will be faster.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save scripts in webpage
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable if you do not want JavaScript in webpages to be saved.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save other stuff
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This includes CSS, extra data possibly needed by scripts, etc...

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save HTML frames
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If there are other webpages inside the one being saved, save those too.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save HTML5 video
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Not recommended, and may not work. This app is not a video downloader.

ListPreference.android:title: Maximum number of retries
ListPreference.android:summary: If a file such as image or script cannot be saved, the app will retry this many times

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable javaScript
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable javaScript in the viewer for saved pages

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Make links absolute
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Recommended. Change links on page so they always point to the correct location, even if they are relative

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable javaScript when generating webpage thumbnail
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Thumbnail generation might be faster with this turned off

SwitchPreference.android:title: Logging (debug messages)
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Include app's messages in the system log. Information about what you are doing in this app may end up in the system log.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Logging (errors)
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Include app's error messages in the system log.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: GitHub project page
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Feature request? Found a bug? Want to contribute? Go here!
